snippet: “My mom said he can now have a martini.” — Jeb Bush on his father, former President George Bush, 91, who is slowly recovering from a broken vertebra after falling at his Maine home this summer.
abstract: “My mom said he can now have a martini.” — Jeb Bush on his father, former President George Bush, 91, who is slowly recovering from a broken vertebra after falling at his Maine home this summer.

headline.main: Verbatim: For George Bush, It’s 5 O’Clock Somewhere
